ModMetaData.name: Apparello v 1.3.1
ModMetaData.author: Shinzy
ModMetaData.description:
Adds few pieces of clothing to the mix to tingle your colonists' sense of fashion with! and help them survive.
New suits of armor and clothes Some are worn by tribals and visitors and others can be obtained by other means. New Research Add Basic armoring which lets you construct crafting station for basic armor And upon researching Machining you can unlock the Advanced armoring, which adds new advanced suits of armor, assembly table, Tailor's workstation and Schematics workbench. New hats Hats now spawn with raiders and visitors alike, Can you collect them all! New Hairs Self explanatory, I hope! Misc Washing machine can still be found here! And it is even less of any real purpose.
